name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a highly skilled Senior Support Engineer with a solid background in Software Development, I possess a robust understanding of system and application security, encompassing **Cyber Security** protocols and practices. With 8 years of experience in delivering technical solutions across various sectors, I excel in **customer communication**, ensuring seamless project management and comprehensive support for clients. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **Java**, **C**, and **C++**, coupled with hands-on experience in Android and iOS development utilizing **Android Studio** and **XCode**. I bring a unique blend of technical acumen and strategic insight to foster secure software solutions while adhering to industry compliance standards. I am committed to implementing best practices for network and system security, ensuring robust protection of enterprise-level applications.
